sets.description: When dealing physical damage, final damage is increased by **8%/9%/10%/11%** and physical damage is increased by an additional **4%/4.5%/5%/5.5% for **3** seconds. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.

When equipped with **2** or more physical weapons, final damage is increased by **24%/26%/29%/32%**. This effect works in the background, and if multiple sets are used, the highest star set will take effect.
